author: prasanna1997_
content:
Hey folks. 

I'm a software developer, can code in Go, Python, JavaScript and Rust (beginner in Rust). I'm bit fluent in C/C++ as well. Professionally, I work on Microservices development, Backend stack, Kubernetes, Cloud native tech.  I've built few Ethereum DApps as hobby projects and I've worked with a team that was building some NFT based application. I'm every excited to be part of this discord channel. 

Looking forward to contribute and get involved wherever possible. 

Thanks
